t: The*pn Lord*s reigns, let*ld the nations tremble; he*ln sits enthroned between the cherubim, let*ld the earth shake.
Great*ln is the Lord*s in Zion; he*ld is exalted over all the nations.
Let*ln them praise your great and awesome name— he*ld is holy.
The*pn King is mighty, he loves justice— you*ld have established equity; in*ln Jacob you have done what*ld is just and right.
Exalt*ln the Lord*s our God and*ld worship at his footstool; he*ld is holy.
Moses*pn and Aaron were among his priests, Samuel*ld was among those who called on his name; they*ln called on the Lord*s and*ld he answered them.
He*ln spoke to them from the pillar of cloud; they*ld kept his statutes and the decrees he gave them.
Lord*spn our God, you*ld answered them; you*ln were to Israel a forgiving God, though*ld you punished their misdeeds.
Exalt*ln the Lord*s our God and*ld worship at his holy mountain, for*ld the Lord*s our God is holy.
